passive.name: Long Night
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong>. Increases DMG dealt by the wearer's Skill and Ultimate by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong>. After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate, gains Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, consumes Somnus Corpus, and increases DMG dealt by follow-up attack by <orangeStrong>{{3}}%</orangeStrong>.
